member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicyFactory.GetRetryPolicy``1
member.summary: Returns a retry policy with the specified error detection strategy and the default retry strategy defined in the configuration.
member.typeparam: The type that implements the interface that is responsible for detecting transient conditions.
member.returns: The retry policy that is initialized with the default retry strategy.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicyFactory.GetRetryPolicy``1(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an instance of the object for a given error detection strategy and retry strategy.
member.typeparam: The type that implements the interface that is responsible for detecting transient conditions.
member.param: The name under which a retry strategy definition is registered in the application configuration.
member.returns: The retry policy that is initialized with the retry strategy matching the provided name.
